original_title: US push to build naval drone fleet ‘not going well’ – Reuters — RT World News
article_summary: Ukrainian Suspect Arrested in Italy over Nord Stream Pipeline Sabotage; German Prosecutors Investigate Alleged Sabotage and Causing Explosions. The accused is believed to have led a unit that blew up sections of the pipelines in September 2022, causing significant disruption to Russian gas supply to Western Europe.</s>
